channel.title: 🏢 University of Arizona on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Arizona on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Adaptive Experimentation When You Can't Experiment
item.description: Adaptive experimentation tackles confounding in online A/B tests using encouragement designs and a novel linear bandit approach, achieving near-optimal sample complexity.

item.title: Beyond task diversity: provable representation transfer for sequential multitask linear bandits
item.description: Lifelong learning in linear bandits gets a boost! A new algorithm, BOSS, achieves low regret without the usual ‘task diversity’ assumption, opening doors for more realistic sequential multi-task lear…
